description:
"Dating, Relationships and Love - Making Them Last Forever" is an invitation to a new experience of yourself, your life, your partner, your friends, family and the world. We discover the spiritual dilemma that underlies the psychological drama of our lives. The course is creative, empowering, process-oriented, where we start relinquishing a thought system based on fear, for one based on love.

Begin an unforgettable journey that will change the way you look at love forever.

We delve into the three crucial ways we sabotage our relationships. We help you begin to see the effect that the unwritten rules of your family, when unconscious undermine the feelings you and your partner have for one another.

Do you find yourself repeating your mothers words? Or your fathers? Discover how your family dynamics-if left festering under the surface, destroy your love and happiness.

Fortunately, there is another way.

It comes from addressing issues head on and bringing into conscious awareness, the deepest, juiciest parts of ourselves. Not to remove them or destroy them, but to celebrate them, to understand them.

From understanding comes forgiveness, openness, and deeper love.

In this exciting, fast-paced course, you'll discover what, if left in the dark, destroyed your relationships in the past:

  • Your family patterns
  • You emotional baggage
  • The Love-O-Meter
  • The Cinderella Fantasy
  • The family rules
  • Your sibling position
  • Your Parent's roles
  • And much more...

Are you ready to give up mediocre relationships? Do you feel it's time to experience true, deep, all-encompassing love on all levels? It's closer and easier than you think!

Join us today and how you feel about relationships will never be the same again! Enroll now.
title: Dating, Relationships and Love Making Them Last Forever
